/>
III.i.2.E.1.e
.
Clinical Mental Health Records Considered Relevant
For the purposes of adjudicating claims for SC for mental disorders, all clinical records from military service are considered relevant and shall be obtained.  See
Moore v. Shinseki
, 555 F.3d 1369 (Fed. Cir. 2009).
Reference
:  For information on clinical records and guidance for requesting such records, see
M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, 2.C
, and
M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, 2.A.
.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section E - Relevance Determinations
citation: Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section E
